titleInfo.title: Ghāyat al-itqān fī tadbīr badan al-insān غاية الاتقان في تدبير بدن الإنسان and Kitāb al-ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmāwī كتاب الطب الجديد الكيماوي Ibn Sallūm ابن سلوم

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Western laid paperDimensions: 305 x 205 mm leaf [240 x 135 mm written]Foliation: Eastern Arabic pagination in black ink, British Museum foliation in pencilRuling: Misṭarah; 30 lines per page; vertical spacing 13 lines per 10 cmScript: Naskh; the scribe is Brāhīm walad Līyās al-‘Aqqād (براهيم ولد لياس العقاد, ff. 178r and 212r)Ink: Black ink, with rubricated headingsDecoration: NoneBinding: British Museum bindingCondition: Bleedthrough of iron-gall ink on most foliosMarginalia: Very fewSeals: f. 178

mods.abstract: (1) Ibn Sallūm (ابن سلوم), Ghāyat al-itqān fī tadbīr badan al-insānغاية الاتقان في تدبير بدن الإنسان), ff. 3v-178r);(2) Ibn Sallūm (ابن سلوم), Kitāb al-ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmāwī(كتاب الطب الجديد الكيماوي, ff. 179r-212v).Before the main texts are notes on medical topics (ff. 1r-3r), which consists mostly of a list of 'obscure names [of medicinal substances] ... and their explanations' (الأسماء الملغزة ... وتفسيرها, ff. 1r-2v).

name.namePart: Ṣāliḥ Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm Ḥalabī
